data.text: @HuffPost Thank you Sarah, you are a very decent human being

@HuffPost First of all , sad that the actions of one cost so many their jobs .. Sara is entitled to express herself .. enough with excuses  for bigotry .. we are becoming immune which is us all going backwards .. taking a stand for what is right is commendable .

@HuffPost Yeah you stand behind ABC because you probably heard that they're thinking of making you the star of the Roseanne spinoff have you ever heard of forgiveness have you ever heard of forgiveness I don't think so Rosanna apologized in an instant more than what other people would have

@grogancali67 @HuffPost Making a pop culture reference to a popular movie franchise, one that was recently Rebooted, in a joke  about an Iranian woman is wrong? How so? For her tweet to have been racist, Valerie Jarrett has to be black, but she's not. She's Iranian.

@HuffPost Well that's probably because she's hoping for a spin off, otherwise I doubt she would have thrown Roseanne into the bus like that, or kissed ABC's ass like this. Spoiler alert though, I won't watch it. #IStandWithRoseanne
@HuffPost She's smart and has a heart.
@HuffPost Only because she wants to steal the show.  Darlene is least liked character...it will die after first airing...Roseanne screwed up royally...but Darlene is not nor ever will be a show.

@HuffPost Yeah Sarah you signed the contract and took the checks home knowing that you’re working with this vile person and you were fully aware of her previous actions. You were complicit until the shit hit the fan.

@Noiseontheset @HuffPost I am Not spewing hate?  If a person is a racist, it would have come out over the last 15 or 25 years that she knew Rosanne.  She never said anything and kept the money train coming from Rosanne. NOW, she throws her under bus...she is an opportunist at best!
@HuffPost I have a new respect for her.
@Zanteus @ianandrewrauch @HuffPost @sarahgilbert01 @billmaher @iamwandasykes @iamsambee Who are those guys? What network is their tv show on?
@HuffPost It's hilarious to see radically liberal  Roseanne at the other end of the political stick in this day and age.

@MeiMimiFan @HuffPost What the hec are you talking about?  How did she milk Roseanne for money.  15 years, she has known her much longer than that.  When spewing hate against someone please at least get some facts straight.
@MorovisGarcia @ianandrewrauch @HuffPost @sarahgilbert01 @billmaher @iamwandasykes @iamsambee She gives more to charity than you make in 2 yrs
@MorovisGarcia @ianandrewrauch @HuffPost @sarahgilbert01 @billmaher @iamwandasykes @iamsambee Wrong cupcake!

@HuffPost I am glad she has her own mind and is strong enough to say Roseanne was wrong.   The whole situation is wrong.   I just feel bad for those who don't make the cash Roseanne makes, but lost their jobs because of her mouth!  #sad
@CoboltCo27 @HuffPost What is real America?
@spismygame @HuffPost She was Left wing nut job
@HuffPost So why is Samantha Bee still working then?

@HuffPost Not defending Roseanne but Sara Gilbert is awful!!! One comment does not make you a racist!  You either are or are not.  She knows Roseanne for 15 years.  She never knew???  Milked Rosanne for 💰, she is a HYPOCRITE, the worst of the worst!!

@HuffPost Sara nd abc knew who Roseanne was just looking at her tweets her past actions
Nah u could have done a roseanne type show but u did a reboot of Roseanne nd she sht on everyone

@HuffPost Sarah what's her face is happy to take anybody's Free Speech away from them even jokes made by Rosanna on her own show Siri you don't have to watch the show if you don't like it don't watch it

@MorovisGarcia @HuffPost @sarahgilbert01 @billmaher @iamwandasykes @iamsambee @BryanDawsonUSA @therealroseanne Look, post all the silly gifs you like. You can't deny which you just published on twitter for everyone to determine for themselves. You're partisan. Purely. It defeats your argument, and destroyed your credibility. Nobody intelligent will take you seriously seeing this.
@HuffPost https://t.co/vtbi2wqDog

@MorovisGarcia @HuffPost @sarahgilbert01 @billmaher @iamwandasykes @iamsambee @BryanDawsonUSA Oh, so you're not done yet Huh? If @therealRoseanne is to be considered racist for making a racist joke (offense, and racism is subjective) then rest assured, so is Sykes, and Maher. Your denial only cements your partisanship. The end
@MorovisGarcia @HuffPost @sarahgilbert01 @billmaher @iamwandasykes @iamsambee K, fair enough

@MorovisGarcia @HuffPost @sarahgilbert01 @billmaher @iamwandasykes @iamsambee @BryanDawsonUSA Here's the difference between me and your hypocritical self. I don't want ANY of them to lose their jobs despite their rhetoric "which is absolutely not better than the other"... Comedians have been making vulgar tasteless jokes racist or otherwise before we were even born. #1A

@MorovisGarcia @HuffPost @sarahgilbert01 @billmaher @iamwandasykes @iamsambee *slow clap* nice refute 🙄
👏... 👏... 👏... 👏...

@HuffPost I would have liked Roseanne to open her show with an sincere apology & given another chance.  Especially if she is bipolar like I read somewhere,  mental illness is very difficult & ppl do relapse.  We forgive others who fall why not her.

@MorovisGarcia @HuffPost @sarahgilbert01 @billmaher @iamwandasykes @iamsambee @therealroseanne Oh? Can you prove she never meant it? Or are you biasedly speculating by nature? It's what partisans do. Don't worry. You're not the only one

@MorovisGarcia @HuffPost @sarahgilbert01 @billmaher @iamwandasykes @iamsambee The double standards are... I can keep posting racist jokes from comedians all day long, and you would justify every single one EXCEPT Roseanne. I'll rest my case right there.
@MorovisGarcia @HuffPost @sarahgilbert01 @billmaher @iamwandasykes @iamsambee Roseanne isn't even really a conservative.
@HuffPost I see that you didn't say anything about the violence caused by antifa over the weekend, if it was the right doing it you would have a lot to say

@MorovisGarcia @HuffPost @sarahgilbert01 @billmaher @iamwandasykes @iamsambee Well you just let those double standards shine right through with misogynistic remarks. I guess you should probably not complain next time someone calls you that for no reason.

@HuffPost So you think it's okay that Michelle Obama gets a call at from the ABC/CEO and Michelle Obama decides who is fired or not? NO! You're just trying to save your ass for your next gig to kiss up do the powers that be. shame on you! I am with @therealroseanne First Amendment rights!!

@MorovisGarcia @HuffPost @sarahgilbert01 @billmaher @iamwandasykes @iamsambee @therealroseanne apologized all the same, but much more regretfully, and sincere. Let's face it... She was victimized through partisanship
@HuffPost F her, she knew who she was working with.
@HuffPost If you should find it in you to help create a new show where the real America is portrayed, please avoid certified lunatics in the cast. Good luck.

@MorovisGarcia @HuffPost @sarahgilbert01 @billmaher @iamwandasykes @iamsambee I never had to reach once. This happened. A joke ALL THE SAME. Is IceCube the ambassador of black people? I think black folks can represent themselves just fine without falling under one black man's ideologue. That's kinda racist.
@MorovisGarcia @ianandrewrauch @HuffPost @sarahgilbert01 @billmaher @iamwandasykes @iamsambee They will never admit they are wrong on this. Way too much salt and contrive dissonance.

@MorovisGarcia @HuffPost @sarahgilbert01 @billmaher @iamwandasykes @iamsambee So you're also going to insinuate that misogyny towards another woman is better than racism? Cherry pick your offenses much?
@HuffPost Go away
@MorovisGarcia @HuffPost @sarahgilbert01 @billmaher @iamwandasykes @iamsambee Wanda made openly prejudice remarks about whites
@HuffPost Bye Rosanne.  You won't be missed https://t.co/a24Dqja4cu
@MorovisGarcia @HuffPost @sarahgilbert01 @billmaher @iamwandasykes @iamsambee Did you seriously not see ALL the mentions? Bill said the N word on live national TV
@HuffPost Self-interest.

@HuffPost Well @sarahgilbert01 if you're going to hold your colleague accountable for a tasteless joke, why not @BillMaher and @iamwandasykes? Should @iamsambee be speaking at award ceremonies? Come on lady, really? These are shock comedians.  Stick up for your friend. I'm disgusted in you
@HuffPost Maybe one monkey doesn't stop a show, but one #ape joke can cause it's cancellation!  bye bye #Roseanne https://t.co/JiJcy6UfkM
@HuffPost Me too!
